name: Multus Fata
description: The story is about of a robot who is forced to run away from home in order to survive and keep on living. This is suppose be a interactive immerse story game were the player has to choose the decisions to see if the choice they made is the right choice or the wrong choice. The player is put in the position of the robot, they must think carefully of the choices they make, otherwise, the choice they make that ends up being a wrong choice will end their fate horribly.
